CustomField.description: Tax Group serves as a container for the related child Tax Records and, when populated on the Billing Line, the calculated Tax Amount is a function of the Combined Tax Rate of all related child Tax Rates.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tax Group serves as a container for the related child Tax Records and, when populated on the Billing Line, the calculated Tax Amount is a function of the Combined Tax Rate of all related child Tax Rates.
CustomField.label: Tax Group
